title: Super Mario Sunshine 4-Koma  Kingdom

status: スーパーマリオサンシャイン ４コマまんが王国 ; Super Mario Sunshine 4-Koma Manga Oukoku ; Super Mario Sunshine 4Koma Manga Kingdom ; Super Mario Sunshine 4Koma Manga Oukoku

Description :
        An official 4koma manga by various artists about the videogame, "Super Mario Sunshine", published in 2002.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2 : Refreshing! Cleaning Up. [Matsuyama Noboru]
